parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'id': 13, 'title': '用例3-投资人-投资2000', 'method': 'post', 'url': 'member/invest', 'pre_sql': None, 'request_data': '{"member_id":"#member_id#","loan_id":#loan_id#,"amount":2000.0}', 'extract': None, 'expected': '{"$..code":0,"$..msg":"OK"}', 'check_sql': '[{"check_type":"value","check_sql":"select leave_amount from member where id=#member_id#","expected":{"leave_amount":float(#money#)-2000}},{"check_type":"value","check_sql":"select amount from loan where id=#loan_id#","expected":{"amount":float(#loan_amount#)-2000}}]'}
